code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectList=_ref=>{let{skill}=_ref;const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{let url="https://me-api-playground-22ao.onrender.com/projects";if(skill)url+="/skill/".concat(skill);axios.get(url).then(res=>setProjects(res.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[skill]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:projects.map(proj=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card h-100 shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:proj.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:proj.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Skills:"})," ",proj.skills.join(", ")]}),proj.links.map((link,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:link,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"btn btn-primary btn-sm me-2",children:["Link ",i+1]},i))]})})},proj._id))});};export default ProjectList;
